Name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Rinascita
AttributesDescription: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in given regions.
BgDescription: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Rinascita. To ensure frequency safety in Rinascita, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.

AccessDescriptions: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita
